item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 18, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Java in the Small (103 points | 45 comments)

3. Cultural Evolution of Cooperation Among LLM Agents (172 points | 88 comments)

6. ISO 8583: The language of credit cards (109 points | 20 comments)

8. Corvus Robotics (YC S18) is hiring a Head of Software to help inventory drones ( | hide)
9. Formally Modeling Dreidel, the Sequel (58 points | 18 comments)
10. Apple Watch with Android (46 points | 19 comments)

13. Updates to H-1B (162 points | 433 comments)

20. Optimizing Ruby's JSON, Part 1 (219 points | 50 comments)
21. Moon (2773 points | 233 comments)

25. 1-800-ChatGPT (252 points | 220 comments)
26. Show HN: ImPlot3D – A 3D Plotting Library for Dear ImGui (147 points | 39 comments)
27. Show HN: Brisk – Cross-Platform C++ GUI Framework: Declarative, Reactive, Fast (69 points | 51 comments)
28. Ergo Chat – A modern IRC server written in Go (260 points | 131 comments)
29. Oldest human genomes reveal how a small group burst out of Africa (88 points | 77 comments)
30. The XOR Texture (2004) (212 points | 49 comments)
